title:
Coolant Hose, Return Flow, Oil Cooler, Replace
(Z20 LET)

steps.text: Drain cooling system - see operation “Cooling System, Drain, Fill and Bleed” Note: Includes releasing coolant hose, return flow from coolant return hose.
Remove fuel tank - see operation “Fuel Tank, Remove and Install”
Remove coolant hose (2) from coolant pipe
Transfer 2x clip and inner sleeve to new coolant hose, return flow
Install coolant hose to coolant pipe
Install fuel tank - see operation “Fuel Tank, Remove and Install”
Fill cooling system - see operation “Cooling System, Drain, Fill and Bleed”

notes:
Drain cooling system - see operation “Cooling System,
Drain, Fill and Bleed”
 Includes
releasing coolant hose, return flow from coolant return hose.
 



•  
Release clip (1)
 





•  
Remove, then discard cable tie (2)
